languages.text: "Ему была дарована чистая и хорошая смерть. Все верно".
"He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."
languages.original_text: "Ему была дарована чистая и хорошая смерть. Все верно".

traits.locale_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. Everything is right."
"He was granted a good, clean death. Everything is right."
"He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."
"He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."
"He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."
"He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

languages.text: «Ha recibido una muerte buena y limpia. Como debería ser».
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

traits.locale_text: «Ha recibido una muerte buena y limpia. Como debería ser».

languages.text: 「彼は、清らかな死を与えられた。そうあるべきであるように」
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は、清らかな死を与えられた。そうあるべきであるように」

languages.text: “他死得很安详、很平静，理应如此。”
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

traits.locale_text: “他死得很安详、很平静，理应如此。”

languages.text: "Ihm wurde ein guter, sauberer Tod gewährt. Wie es sich gehört."
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

traits.locale_text: "Ihm wurde ein guter, sauberer Tod gewährt. Wie es sich gehört."

languages.text: « On lui a accordé une mort propre et digne. Comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."

traits.locale_text: « On lui a accordé une mort propre et digne. Comme il se doit. »

languages.text: "Ona güzel, temiz bir ölüm lütfedildi. Olması gerektiği gibi."
languages.original_text: "He was granted a good, clean death. As it should be."
